column4: Hi. If I make a data cd using ubuntu 12.04 will it be readable on a Windows or Mac machine?
yes, data CDs all use the same filesystem
Hi. So no problem to read a linux made cd on a windows or mac machine?
I would confirm it on my windows xp machine except it's refusing to recognise the cd/dvd drive - xp I mean.. Ok I believe you. ha ha . THanks.
